1.title: John 1:1
1.subtitle: In the beginning was the Word
1.description: A powerful reminder of the eternal nature of Christ.

2.title: Romans 8:28
2.subtitle: All things work together for good
2.description: An encouragement to trust in God's plan even in difficult circumstances.

3.title: Psalm 23:1
3.subtitle: The Lord is my shepherd
3.description: A comforting verse reminding us of God's provision and guidance.

4.title: Isaiah 41:10
4.subtitle: Do not fear, for I am with you
4.description: God’s promise to always be with us, no matter the challenge.

5.title: Matthew 28:6
5.subtitle: He is not here; He has risen
5.description: The Easter verse that celebrates Christ's victory over death.

6.title: John 3:16
6.subtitle: For God so loved the world
6.description: A verse that captures the essence of God’s love for mankind.

7.title: Philippians 4:13
7.subtitle: I can do all things through Christ
7.description: A reminder of the strength we have through Christ.

8.title: Matthew 5:14
8.subtitle: You are the light of the world
8.description: Jesus calls His followers to be a beacon of light in the darkness.

9.title: Romans 12:2
9.subtitle: Do not conform to the pattern of this world
9.description: A challenge to live distinctively as believers, transformed by God's word.

10.title: Luke 2:11
10.subtitle: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Savior
10.description: A verse marking the birth of Jesus, fitting for Christmas Day.

11.title: Proverbs 3:5-6
11.subtitle: Trust in the Lord with all your heart
11.description: A call to trust fully in God's direction in our lives.

12.title: Jeremiah 29:11
12.subtitle: I know the plans I have for you
12.description: A verse of encouragement about God's good plans for us.

13.title: Isaiah 40:31
13.subtitle: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength
13.description: A reminder that God provides the strength we need when we wait on Him.

14.title: Luke 1:37
14.subtitle: For no word from God will ever fail
14.description: A powerful affirmation of God’s faithfulness.

15.title: 1 Peter 5:7
15.subtitle: Cast all your anxiety on Him
15.description: God cares for us and invites us to bring our burdens to Him.

16.title: Matthew 11:28
16.subtitle: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened
16.description: Jesus' invitation to find rest in Him.

17.title: Psalm 46:1
17.subtitle: God is our refuge and strength
17.description: A verse that assures us of God’s protection and strength.

18.title: John 14:6
18.subtitle: I am the way and the truth and the life
18.description: Jesus boldly declares He is the only way to the Father.

19.title: 1 Corinthians 13:4-7
19.subtitle: Love is patient, love is kind
19.description: A beautiful description of what true love looks like.

20.title: 1 Timothy 4:12
20.subtitle: Let no one despise your youth
20.description: A call to young people to live boldly and with purpose for the Lord.

21.title: Psalm 19:1
21.subtitle: The heavens declare the glory of God
21.description: A verse celebrating the majesty of God revealed in creation.

22.title: Ephesians 6:10-11
22.subtitle: Put on the full armor of God
22.description: A call to be spiritually equipped for battle.

23.title: 2 Corinthians 5:17
23.subtitle: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come
23.description: A reminder of our new identity in Christ.

24.title: 1 John 4:19
24.subtitle: We love because He first loved us
24.description: The foundation of our love for others is God’s love for us.

25.title: Revelation 21:4
25.subtitle: He will wipe every tear from their eyes
25.description: A verse offering hope of a future without pain or sorrow.

26.title: Matthew 6:33
26.subtitle: Seek first His kingdom and His righteousness
26.description: A call to prioritize God’s kingdom over everything else.

27.title: Isaiah 55:8-9
27.subtitle: For My thoughts are not your thoughts
27.description: A reminder that God’s ways are higher than ours.

28.title: 1 John 3:16
28.subtitle: This is how we know what love is
28.description: The ultimate demonstration of love was Christ’s sacrifice for us.

29.title: Romans 15:13
29.subtitle: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace
29.description: A prayer for joy and peace that comes from God.

30.title: Mark 10:27
30.subtitle: With man it is impossible, but not with God
30.description: A verse reminding us of God's limitless power.

31.title: Luke 10:19
31.subtitle: I have given you authority to trample on snakes and scorpions
31.description: Jesus assures us of His authority over evil.

32.title: Psalm 139:14
32.subtitle: I am fearfully and wonderfully made
32.description: A verse celebrating our unique design and value in God's eyes.

33.title: Matthew 7:7
33.subtitle: Ask and it will be given to you
33.description: An invitation to pray and trust in God’s generosity.

34.title: Romans 6:23
34.subtitle: For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life
34.description: A reminder of the contrast between sin’s consequences and God’s gift of life.

35.title: Hebrews 12:1
35.subtitle: Let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us
35.description: A call to persevere in the Christian journey.

36.title: Psalm 34:8
36.subtitle: Taste and see that the Lord is good
36.description: A verse inviting us to experience God’s goodness.

37.title: 2 Timothy 1:7
37.subtitle: For the Spirit God gave us does not make us timid
37.description: A reminder that God has given us power, love, and self-discipline.

38.title: Titus 2:7
38.subtitle: In everything set them an example by doing what is good
38.description: A call to be a godly example in every area of life.

39.title: Exodus 14:14
39.subtitle: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still
39.description: A verse that reminds us to trust in God’s battle for us.

40.title: 2 Corinthians 4:18
40.subtitle: So we fix our eyes not on what is seen, but on what is unseen
40.description: A reminder to focus on eternal, unseen things rather than temporary challenges.
